mapper.insert: insert into bus_booking (trip_id, user_id, status) values (#{tripId}, #{userId}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from bus_booking where trip_id = #{tripId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update bus_booking set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from bus_booking where trip_id = #{tripId} and status = #{status}
select * from bus_booking where trip_id = #{tripId} and status = #{status} order by created_at asc limit 1

select b.id, b.trip_id, b.user_id, u.username, r.name as route_name, r.origin, r.destination, t.bus_no, t.departure_time, t.arrival_time, b.status, b.created_at from bus_booking b join bus_trip t on t.id = b.trip_id join bus_route r on r.id = t.route_id join `user` u on u.id = b.user_id where b.user_id = #{userId} order by b.created_at desc
